sn54.12:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma lomasakambhiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn54.12:1.2: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yenayasma lomasakambhiyo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam lomasakambhiyam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko ayasmantam lomasakambhiyam etadavoca:
sn54.12:1.3: “so eva nu kho, bhante, sekho viharo so tathagataviharo, udahu annova sekho viharo anno tathagataviharo”ti?
sn54.12:2.1: “Na kho, avuso mahanama, sveva sekho viharo, so tathagataviharo.
sn54.12:2.2: Anno kho, avuso mahanama, sekho viharo, anno tathagataviharo.
sn54.12:2.3: Ye te, avuso mahanama, bhikkhu sekha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, te panca nivarane pahaya viharanti.
sn54.12:3.1: Yepi te, avuso mahanama, bhikkhu sekha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, te ime panca nivarane pahaya viharanti.
sn54.12:4.1: Ye ca kho te, avuso mahanama, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tesam panca nivarana pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn54.12:4.3: Kamacchandanivaranam pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam;
sn54.12:4.7: vicikicchanivaranam pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn54.12:5.1: Ye te, avuso mahanama, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tesam ime panca nivarana pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn54.12:5.2: Tadaminapetam, avuso mahanama, pariyayena veditabbam yatha—
sn54.12:6.1: Ekamidam, avuso mahanama, samayam bhagava icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
sn54.12:6.2: Tatra kho, avuso mahanama, bhagava bhikkhu amantesi:
sn54.12:6.4: Namhi kenaci upasankamitabbo, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena’ti.
sn54.12:6.5: ‘Evam, bhante’ti kho, avuso mahanama, te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva nassudha koci bhagavantam upasankamati, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena.
sn54.12:7.1: Atha kho, avuso, bhagava tassa temasassa accayena patisallana vutthito bhikkhu amantesi:
sn54.12:7.2: ‘sace kho, bhikkhave, annatitthiya paribbajaka evam puccheyyum:
sn54.12:7.3: “katamenavuso, viharena samano gotamo vassavasam bahulam vihasi”ti, evam puttha tumhe, bhikkhave, tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam evam byakareyyatha:
sn54.12:7.4: “anapanassatisamadhina kho, avuso, bhagava vassavasam bahulam vihasi”’ti.
sn54.12:7.5: Idhaham, bhikkhave, sato assasami, sato passasami.
sn54.12:7.6: Digham assasanto digham assasamiti pajanami, digham passasanto digham passasamiti pajanami …pe…
sn54.12:7.7: patinissagganupassi assasissamiti pajanami, patinissagganupassi passasissamiti pajanami.
sn54.12:8.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya—
sn54.12:8.2: ariyaviharo itipi, brahmaviharo itipi, tathagataviharo itipi.
sn54.12:8.4: ariyaviharo itipi, brahmaviharo itipi, tathagataviharo itipi.
sn54.12:9.1: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, tesam anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato asavanam khayaya samvattati.
sn54.12:10.1: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tesam anapanassatisamadhi bhavito bahulikato dittheva dhamme sukhaviharaya ceva samvattati satisampajannaya ca.
sn54.12:11.1: Yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya—
sn54.12:11.2: ariyaviharo itipi, brahmaviharo itipi, tathagataviharo itipi.
sn54.12:11.4: ariyaviharo itipi, brahmaviharo itipi, tathagataviharo itipiti.
sn54.12:11.5: Imina kho etam, avuso mahanama, pariyayena veditabbam, yatha—
